00139   inline double MsqHessian::norm() const {
00140     double sum = 0.0;
00141     for (size_t i = 0; i < mRowStart[mSize]; ++i)
00142       sum += Frobenius_2(mEntries[i]);
00143     return sqrt(sum);
00144   }
00145 
00149   inline void MsqHessian::zero_out()
00150     {
00151       if (mSize==0) return; // empty hessian.
00152     
00153       size_t i;
00154       for (i=0; i<mRowStart[mSize]; ++i) {
00155         mEntries[i].zero();
00156       }
00157     }
00158     
00159   inline void MsqHessian::scale( double value )
00160     {
00161       for (size_t i = 0; i < mRowStart[mSize]; ++i) 
00162         mEntries[i] *= value;
00163     }

00210    
00211   inline void MsqHessian::add( size_t row, size_t col, const Matrix3D& m, MsqError& err )
00212   {
00213     if (row <= col) {
00214       for (size_t i = mRowStart[row]; i != mRowStart[row+1]; ++i)
00215         if (mColIndex[i] == col) {
00216           mEntries[i] += m;
00217           return;
00218         }
00219     }
00220     else {
00221       for (size_t i = mRowStart[col]; i != mRowStart[col+1]; ++i)
00222         if (mColIndex[i] == row) {
00223           mEntries[i].plus_transpose_equal( m );
00224           return;
00225         }
00226     }
00227     
00228     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::INVALID_ARG, 
00229                    "Hessian entry (%lu,%lu) does not exist.",
00230                    (unsigned long)row, (unsigned long)col);
00231   }
00232    
00241   inline void axpy(Vector3D res[], size_t size_r,
00242                    const MsqHessian &H, const Vector3D x[], size_t size_x,
00243                    const Vector3D y[], size_t size_y, MsqError &/*err*/)
00244     {
00245       if ((size_r != H.mSize) || (size_x != H.mSize) ||
00246           (size_y != H.mSize && size_y != 0)) {
00247         // throw an error
00248       }
00249 
00250       Vector3D tmpx, tmpm; // for cache opt.
00251       size_t* col = H.mColIndex;
00252       const size_t nn = H.mSize;
00253       size_t rl; // row length
00254       size_t el; // entries index
00255       size_t lo;
00256       size_t c;  // column index
00257       size_t i, j;
00258      
00259       if (y != 0) {
00260         for (i = 0; i < nn; ++i) {
00261           res[i] = y[i];
00262         }
00263       } 
00264       else {          // y == 0
00265         for (i = 0; i < nn; ++i) {
00266           res[i] = 0.;
00267         }
00268       }
00269       
00270       el = 0;
00271       for (i = 0; i < nn; ++i) {
00272         rl = H.mRowStart[i+1] - H.mRowStart[i];
00273         lo = *col++;
00274 
00275         // Diagonal entry
00276         tmpx = x[i];
00277         eqAx(tmpm, H.mEntries[el], tmpx);
00278         ++el;
00279         
00280         //Non-diagonal entries
00281         for (j = 1; j < rl; ++j) {
00282           c = *col++;
00283           //          res[i] += H.mEntries[e] * x[c];
00284           plusEqAx(tmpm, H.mEntries[el], x[c]);
00285           //          res[c] += transpose(H.mEntries[e]) * tmpxi;
00286           plusEqTransAx(res[c], H.mEntries[el], tmpx);
00287           ++el;
00288         }
00289         res[lo] += tmpm;
00290       }
00291     }
00292 
00294   inline void MsqHessian::apply_preconditioner(Vector3D zloc[],
00295                                                Vector3D rloc[],
00296                                                MsqError& /*err*/)
00297     {
00298       size_t m;
00299 
00300       for (m=0; m<mSize; ++m) {
00301 #ifdef DIAGONAL_PRECONDITIONER
00302         // preconditioner is identity matrix for now.
00303         zloc[m][0] = mPreconditioner[m][0][0] * rloc[m][0]; 
00304         zloc[m][1] = mPreconditioner[m][1][1] * rloc[m][1]; 
00305         zloc[m][2] = mPreconditioner[m][2][2] * rloc[m][2]; 
00306 #else
00307         // z = inv(L^T) * r
00308         zloc[m][0] = rloc[m][0];
00309         zloc[m][1] = rloc[m][1] - mPreconditioner[m][0][1] * zloc[m][0];
00310         zloc[m][2] = rloc[m][2] - mPreconditioner[m][0][2] * zloc[m][0] - mPreconditioner[m][1][2] * zloc[m][1];
00311 
00312         // z = inv(D) * z
00313         zloc[m][0] *= mPreconditioner[m][0][0];
00314         zloc[m][1] *= mPreconditioner[m][1][1];
00315         zloc[m][2] *= mPreconditioner[m][2][2];
00316 
00317         // z = inv(L) * z
00318         zloc[m][2] = zloc[m][2];
00319         zloc[m][1] = zloc[m][1] - mPreconditioner[m][1][2] * zloc[m][2];
00320         zloc[m][0] = zloc[m][0] - mPreconditioner[m][0][1] * zloc[m][1] - mPreconditioner[m][0][2] * zloc[m][2];
00321 #endif
00322       }
00323     }
00324 
00325   
00330   inline Matrix3D* MsqHessian::get_block(size_t i, size_t j)
00331     {
00332       size_t c;
00333       
00334       if (i >= mSize || j >= mSize || j < i)
00335         return NULL;
00336 
00337       for (c=mRowStart[i]; c<mRowStart[i+1]; ++c) {
00338         if (mColIndex[c] == j)
00339           return ( mEntries + c );
00340       }
00341     
00342       // if there is no block at position i,j (zero entry).
00343       return NULL;
00344     }
00345   inline const Matrix3D* MsqHessian::get_block(size_t i, size_t j) const
00346     { return const_cast<MsqHessian*>(this)->get_block(i,j); }
